title: Get a 1st-gen Apple Watch Ultra with a one-year return policy for $300 off today
content:
Macworld

There are smartwatches and then there’s Apple Watch Ultra, a rugged alternative to the popular band from Apple, giving you more functionality in the same attractive package. And today it’s cheap too: Amazon’s Premium Refurbished Store is selling the Apple Watch Ultra for $499, which means you’re getting a fully inspected and tested device that promises to be in excellent condition. And if it’s not–Amazon backs it with an incredible 365-day return policy.

Built for athletes, outdoor adventurers, and water sports enthusiasts, the Apple Watch Ultra will survive all your summer plans. Featuring a rugged corrosion-resistant titanium case, a water resistance rating of 100 meters, as well as up to 36 hours of battery life, you can stay connected and on top of your fitness goals without worrying about frequent recharging.

The giant 49mm display is absolutely stunning and comes with a handy always-on feature, as well as Night Mode—a feature that turns all elements on the watch face red to help preserve your night vision. Plus, its larger Digital Crown and accessible buttons make navigation easy, whether you’re hiking up a mountain or swimming in the ocean.

Compared to the Apple Watch Ultra 2, the only features you’re giving up are a newer S9 chip, a brighter display, and the new double-tap gesture. Otherwise, this watch is identical to the newer model.

Now, we know that we usually recommend brand-new devices, but this deal is just too good to pass up, especially given the full price of this Apple Watch model. Amazon says the watch is “inspected, tested, and refurbished, as necessary to be fully functional according to Amazon Renewed standards.” Plus, instead of a manufacturer warranty, it’s eligible for a return, refund, or replacement within 365 days of receipt, adding extra peace of mind to this fantastic deal.

Considering that a brand-new Apple Watch Ultra costs $799, it’s fantastic that you can get this one that’s in perfect working order at such a low price. So don’t miss out on this deal and get yourself an Apple Watch Ultra for just $499 at Amazon.
